section.name: Navigation
section.p: Like any other page or component, the content is made available on the site by ensuring there is a sitemap item referring to the component created in the previous step. You do this in the URL and Navigation Management area of the CMS Channel Manager. In the sitemap section, create a new entry corresponding to the desired URL, set the level pattern to refer to the top level page containing your component and point the Content path to your poll document.
The above defines an URL for your poll, which you can now use to link to from other pages and/or menus.
